EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What’s New in 8.3 Service Pack 1 - Internal - 2015.01.20.Email - Invit
EmailTemplate.subject: What's New in 8.3 Service Pack 1? Join our Webinar to find out!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: What’s New in 8.3 Service Pack 1
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Tricentis would like to wish you a happy new year by presenting our new 8.3 Service Pack 1 Release. The new year brings many new features to help enhance the Tosca Testsuite experience. We are offering an exclusive sneak peek of all our cool new features through our ‘What’s New’ Webinar.
Our VP of Project Management, Gerd Weishaar and Roman Zednik, Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales and Consulting will be walking you through all our new features, which will include:
- X-Scan - Support: Siebel Open UI - Taas with Web Automation - Optical Intelligence - Extras: Loops & Conditions, Mobile+
Our ‘What’s New’ Webinar will take place on January 20, 2015 starting at 3:00pm CET. Don’t miss out!
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-internal.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-internal.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Tue, Jan 20, 2015 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. CET 9:00 a.m. – 10:00 a.m. EST
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting Tricentis
